Reviews.Title: Best For The Money
Reviews.Author: KB
Reviews.Content: I bought 9 of these 19 months ago and have lost 2 due to weathering, I live on the coast and they are in all kinds of wind and rain so I think these are very tough cameras. The picture quality is better than some of the 700 TV lines cameras I have tried at twice the price. Night vision is a little grainy but can see well out to 50'. Don't mount them to high off the ground, between 3' and 10' works the best. I think sealing the small screw heads and wire with a water proof grease will help them last longer. Buying 4 more at this price is a must for me.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras
Reviews.Author: Chris W Grant
Reviews.Content: I bought these cameras to add onto my existing systems.  These CCD cameras replaced some old CMOS cameras, and the camera quality doubled.Love these

ProductInfo.Features:
1/4-Inch Sony Color CCD Image Sensor
6mm Lens
Weatherproof
Night Vision
Ceiling or Wall mount
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo PKC-S12316SV  Security Surveillance Camera (Silver)
